route_plan_template.description: Standard template for outputting a calculated route plan.

road_plan.from: Location A name and brief identifier
road_plan.to: Location B name and brief identifier
road_plan.distance: Formatted distance with units (e.g., '162 m (0.1 mi)')
road_plan.directions: Concise, human-readable turn-by-turn instructions from the directions API.

road_plan.to: ENIAC (Moore Building, Penn School of Engineering)
road_plan.directions: Head east on Smith Walk toward S 33rd St (take the stairs). Turn left onto S 33rd St. Destination will be on the left.

distance_matrix_template.description: Template for presenting the raw distance/time matrix data.
